mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_record (userId, status, bookId, endDate, duration, review) VALUES (#{userId}, #{status}, #{bookId}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{review})
mapper.select: SELECT br.id, br.userId, br.status, br.bookId, br.endDate, br.duration, br.review, bl.title, bl.image, bl.author FROM book_record br LEFT JOIN book_list bl ON br.bookId = bl.isbn WHERE br.userId = #{userId}

SELECT br.id, br.userId, br.status, br.bookId, br.endDate, br.duration, br.review, bl.title, bl.image, bl.author FROM book_record br LEFT JOIN book_list bl ON br.bookId = bl.isbn WHERE br.userId = #{userId} AND br.status = #{status}

SELECT br.id, br.userId AS userId, br.status, br.bookId AS bookId, br.endDate AS endDate, br.duration, br.review, bl.title, bl.image, bl.author FROM book_record br LEFT JOIN book_list bl ON br.bookId = bl.isbn WHERE br.bookId = #{bookId}

SELECT br.id, br.userId, br.status, br.bookId, br.endDate, br.duration, br.review, br.record_at AS recordAt, bl.title, bl.image, bl.author FROM book_record br LEFT JOIN book_list bl ON br.bookId = bl.isbn WHERE br.userId = #{userId} AND br.bookId = #{bookId}
SELECT id, userId, bookId, status, duration, review, endDate FROM book_record WHERE userId = #{userId} AND YEAR(endDate) = #{year}
SELECT id, userId, status, bookId, endDate, duration, review FROM book_record WHERE userId = #{userId} AND endDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND CURDATE()
